attachments.fallback: GitHub: `gk` moves the cursor unexpectedly below a long folded line · Issue #4969 · vim/vim
attachments.title: `gk` moves the cursor unexpectedly below a long folded line · Issue #4969 · vim/vim
attachments.text: Describe the bug Sometimes, gk doesn&#39;t move the cursor on the previous screen line, but at the start of the line. To Reproduce Run this shell command: $ vim -Nu NONE +&quot;set co=80|setl fml=0...
